doc:
Harry Monty https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Harry_Monty 0 Harry Monty (born Hymie Liechtenstein; April 15, 1904 in Dallas, Texas, USA – December 28, 1999) was an American actor of Polish descent, dwarf actor and stuntperson, whose most notable role was as a Munchkin and a winged monkey in the Wizard of Oz. Harry Monty ( born_Hymie_Liechtenstein ; April_15_,_1904 in Dallas , Texas , USA – December_28_,_1999 ) was an_American_actor of Polish_descent , dwarf_actor_and_stuntperson , whose_most_notable_role was as a_Munchkin and a_winged_monkey in the_Wizard of Oz .
